import "./App.css"; import { useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { get } from "./BooksAPI"; import Card from "./Card"; function App() { const [showSearchPage, setShowSearchpage] = useState(false); const [query, setQuery] = useState([]); get( u).then((data) => setQuery(data)); // get url params const [params,setparams] = useState(useParams()); console.log( params.id, ); get(params.id).then((book) => { console.log(book); }); return (
{showSearchPage ? (
setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)} > Close
    ) : (

    MyReads

    Currently Reading

      {}
    1. To Kill a Mockingbird
      Harper Lee
    2. Ender's Game
      Orson Scott Card
    setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)}>Add a book
    )}
    ); } export default App;
